summary: Completed comprehensive RBAC testing for CRM Hotel Contacts endpoint. All 3 required scenarios passed successfully with 100% success rate.
passed_tests: Hotel admin user creation and authentication
SCENARIO 1 (POSITIVE): Agency user linked to hotel → GET hotel contacts → 200 OK with array response
SCENARIO 2 (NEGATIVE): Agency user NOT linked to hotel → GET hotel contacts → 403 FORBIDDEN
SCENARIO 3 (NEGATIVE): Hotel admin NOT owner of hotel → GET hotel contacts → 403 FORBIDDEN
BONUS: Hotel admin accessing own hotel contacts → 200 OK

success_percentage.frontend: N/A (frontend testing skipped as per request)
